term: package of water heater and solar device
original_definition: 'package of water heater and solar device' means a package offered to the end-user containing one or more water heaters and one or more solar devices;
generated_definition: 'package of water heater and solar device' means a device comprising a water heater and a solar device, as defined in the sentences provided.
